verses.verse: And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hanani <S%H2607><s%> the seer <S%H2374><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H6440><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%>, Shouldest thou help <S%H5826><s%> the ungodly <S%H7563><s%>, and love <S%H157><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>? therefore <S%H2063><s%> is wrath <S%H7110><s%> upon thee from before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> there are good <S%H2896><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> in thee, in that thou hast taken away <S%H1197><s%> the groves <S%H842><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, and hast prepared <S%H3559><s%> thine heart <S%H3824><s%> to seek <S%H1875><s%> God <S%H430><s%>.

And Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and he went out <S%H3318><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> through the people <S%H5971><s%> from Beersheba <S%H884><s%> to mount <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and brought them back <S%H7725><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>. he went: Heb. he returned and went out
And he set <S%H5975><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> throughout all the fenced <S%H1219><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, city <S%H5892><s%> by city <S%H5892><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%> to the judges <S%H8199><s%>, Take heed <S%H7200><s%> what ye do <S%H6213><s%>: for ye judge <S%H8199><s%> not for man <S%H120><s%>, but for the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, who is with you in the judgment <S%H1697><s%> <S%H4941><s%>. in: Heb. in the matter of judgment

Wherefore now let the fear <S%H6343><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be upon you; take heed <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> it: for there is no iniquity <S%H5766><s%> with the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, nor respect <S%H4856><s%> of persons <S%H6440><s%>, nor taking <S%H4727><s%> of gifts <S%H7810><s%>.

Moreover in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> did Jehoshaphat <S%H3092><s%> set <S%H5975><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and of the priests <S%H3548><s%>, and of the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, for the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and for controversies <S%H7379><s%>, when they returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And he charged <S%H6680><s%> them, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, faithfully <S%H530><s%>, and with a perfect <S%H8003><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%>.

And what cause <S%H7379><s%> soever shall come <S%H935><s%> to you of your brethren <S%H251><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%>, between blood <S%H1818><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%>, between law <S%H8451><s%> and commandment <S%H4687><s%>, statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%>, ye shall even warn <S%H2094><s%> them that they trespass <S%H816><s%> not against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and so wrath <S%H7110><s%> come upon you, and upon your brethren <S%H251><s%>: this <S%H3541><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>, and ye shall not trespass <S%H816><s%>.

And, behold, Amariah <S%H568><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> is over you in all matters <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, the ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, for all the king's <S%H4428><s%> matters <S%H1697><s%>: also the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be officers <S%H7860><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you. Deal <S%H6213><s%> courageously <S%H2388><s%>, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be with the good <S%H2896><s%>. Deal: Heb. Take courage and do
